text:
I already tried many chicken rice shop in Singapore but I think Fitra is the best one in all of that. I like the rice, pineapples slices, pickled cucumber and their sauces are different from other shops. Chicken not much need to chew and it easily melting in my mouth. Mustard also cut my small pieces and it is very easy to eat. I give rating 10/10
for food and 9/10 for services

Bought a normal chicken rice (breast meat), added rice and gizzards. $8.30. Wow. The amount of meat was pathetic tbh for the price.
Rice wasn’t very good. Chili is not bad. Chicken is average without much sauce. Normally for this amount there will be a separated plate for the ingredient and rice but this is just honestly not worth the price and not worth coming back.
Frequent stall that I always eat. Always order from a lady, asked for boneless , no issue. Today a Malay guy told him don’t want bone end up giving me bone. Rice taste like uncooked too.
I was quite disappointed with the porridge here—watery and little. It’s a contrast to the NEX outlet, where the porridge is thick, and satisfying. Plus they served with a smile. Consistency matters!

I request to buy only rice but the counter say can't not . So I decided to buy the normal chicken rice but separate the chicken,it's ok if they charge me 50cent or $1 I will pay . But the counter say "if separate chicken $10" wtf . Normal chicken rice only $5.00 plus .
